messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

outlook constantly freezes constantly freezes hi constantly freezes during for seconds random intervals goes responding stage unusable have heard multiple complaining about can you please raise ticket investigate if issue proves be more complex please ask raise problem record thank you manager
